🔹 Usage Instructions for **Adol-Sinus**: ⭐ Adults & elderly: 1-2 caplets up to 3 times daily (max 6 caplets per day). ⭐ Adolescents (16-18 years): 2 caplets up to 3 times daily (max 6 caplets per day). ⭐ Adolescents (12-15 years): 1 caplet up to 3 times daily (max 3 caplets per day). ⭐ Leave at least 4 hours between doses. ⭐ Do not exceed the recommended dosage.

Name: Primalac Premium Ultima AR2 Baby Milk 400 gm for Reflux
Description:
Primalac Premium Ultima AR2 is the next generation of infant formula from Primalac, specially designed for infants aged 6 to 12 months suffering from frequent regurgitation. It reduces constant crying and discomfort caused by heartburn and vomiting thanks to its easy-to-digest formulation with thickening agents. **Primalac Premium Ultima AR2** ensures your baby's physical and mental growth by providing all the essential nutrients and micronutrients. 

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima AR2**:
⭐ Wash your hands thoroughly.
⭐ Boil the bottle, nipple, and ring for 5 minutes and keep them covered.
⭐ Boil water and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
⭐ Follow the feeding chart precisely: pour water first, then add the powder using the enclosed scoop.
⭐ Level off the excess powder from the scoop.
⭐ Store the dry scoop in the container and close it tightly.
⭐ Shake the bottle well until the milk is completely dissolved and check the temperature before feeding.
⭐ Consume any remaining formula within 1 hour.
⭐ As **Primalac Premium Ultima AR2** contains thickening agents, it's recommended to use a nipple with a wider hole.

🔹 Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima AR2**:
⭐ Protein (Skimmed cow's milk)
⭐ Nucleotides
⭐ Omega 3 & Omega 6
⭐ Thickening agent (Carob bean gum)
⭐ Minerals and Vitamins

Description:

This specialized nutritional formula is carefully designed to provide complete and safe nutrition for your baby from 6 months onwards, focusing on improving digestion and absorption. **Blemil Plus 2 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm** is an effective and safe alternative for babies who require a diet free from intact cow's milk protein.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus 2 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm**:
⭐ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
⭐ Sterilize all feeding utensils (bottle, teat, ring) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
⭐ Boil drinking water and let it cool to a temperature between 40-45°C.
⭐ Pour the appropriate amount of water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
⭐ Add the number of level measures indicated in the dosage table.
⭐ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
⭐ Test the temperature of the feed on your hand before giving it.

🔹 Ingredients of **Blemil Plus 2 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm**:
⭐ Maltodextrin, Vegetable oils (Sunflower, Coconut, Rapeseed, Borage).
⭐ Hydrolyzed casein (from cow's milk), Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCT).
⭐ Various mineral salts and vitamins to support healthy growth.
⭐ Inulin, Emulsifiers, Animal fat (Fish oil for DHA).
⭐ Mortierella alpina oil (for AA), Choline chloride.
⭐ L-Cystine, L-Tryptophan, Taurine, Inositol.
⭐ Nucleotides, Lactic ferments (L. rhamnosus, B. infantis).
⭐ Antioxidants (Mix of tocopherols, Ascorbyl palmitate), L-Carnitine.

Name: Bebelac Anti-Regurgitation Milk for Infants - 400 gm
Description:
Introducing **Bebelac Anti-Regurgitation Milk**, a specialized formula designed for infants experiencing difficulty keeping milk down, commonly known as regurgitation or reflux. **Bebelac Anti-Regurgitation Milk** is specifically formulated to reduce your baby’s symptoms, making it an ideal choice for infants from birth onwards. Our Complete Care formula ensures that all your baby's nutritional needs for healthy growth are met, providing essential nutrients like Calcium, Iron, Vitamin D, and Zinc. This milk can be used alongside breastfeeding or as a substitute when needed, and it is formulated to gently thicken milk in your baby's stomach, helping to ease discomfort from regurgitation.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Bebelac Anti-Regurgitation Milk**

⭐ Wash hands and sterilize all utensils.
⭐ Boil fresh drinking water. Leave to cool in the kettle for 30 minutes until it reaches a suitable temperature (around 37°C).
⭐ Measure the required amount of water (refer to product feeding guide) and pour it into a sterilized feeding bottle. Do not use repeatedly boiled water.
⭐ Always use the scoop provided with the product. Level off the powder with the built-in leveler. Do not press extra powder into the scoop.
⭐ Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful to your baby.
⭐ Cap the bottle and shake well (for 10 seconds) to dissolve the powder completely. Remove the cap and replace it with a sterilized teat.
⭐ Check the milk temperature on your wrist before feeding to ensure it's suitable (around 37°C).
⭐ Use made-up feeds within 1 hour and always discard unfinished feeds.
⭐ Do not heat feeds in a microwave, as hot spots may occur and cause scalding.

🔹 Ingredients of **Bebelac Anti-Regurgitation Milk**

⭐ Skimmed Cow's Milk Powder.
⭐ Vegetable Oils (Palmolein, High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil).
⭐ Lactose.
⭐ Demineralised Whey.
⭐ Corn Starch.
⭐ Locust Bean Gum (Thickener).
⭐ Whey Concentrate.
⭐ Dicalcium Phosphate.
⭐ Calcium Carbonate.
⭐ Choline Chloride.
⭐ Lemon Juice Concentrate (Antioxidant).
⭐ Vitamins (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Pantothenic Acid, Niacin, Vitamin B1, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B12, Biotin).
⭐ Minerals (Iron Pyrophosphate, Zinc Sulphate, Ferrous Sulphate, Copper Sulphate, Sodium Selenite).
⭐ Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin).
⭐ Taurine.
⭐ Inositol.
⭐ L-Carnitine.

Name: Pigeon Manual Breast Pump Basic Slim Neck - Comfort & Efficiency
Description:
Discover the ultimate breast milk expression experience with the **Pigeon Manual Breast Pump Basic Slim Neck**. This pump is designed to provide you with maximum comfort and efficiency every time. The soft silicone Comfort ProperFit™ cushion ensures a secure and comfortable seal, significantly enhancing pumping efficiency. Enjoy innovative two-phase technology that mimics your baby's natural feeding pattern, with a stimulation phase to gently initiate milk flow and an expression phase to maximize milk output. You can easily adjust the suction pressure across 6 different levels to suit your needs. Thanks to its portable and compact design, you can use it anytime, anywhere, making it the perfect companion for modern mothers. The **Pigeon Manual Breast Pump Basic Slim Neck** is simple and easy to use, featuring fewer parts for easier assembly, use, and cleaning. The hygienic valve design prevents milk from flowing back into the tubing, ensuring milk hygiene. It comes with a bottle stand to secure the bottle and prevent it from falling, making it a complete and practical solution.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Manual Breast Pump Basic Slim Neck**:
⭐ Ensure all parts are clean and sterilized before use.
⭐ Assemble the pump according to the instructions.
⭐ Place the silicone cushion comfortably around the nipple.
⭐ Begin stimulation by gently pressing the handle to encourage milk flow.
⭐ Switch to the expression phase by increasing the pressure to maximize milk output.
⭐ Select the appropriate suction pressure level for you from the 6 available settings.
⭐ Clean the pump thoroughly after each use.

🔹 Ingredients of **Pigeon Manual Breast Pump Basic Slim Neck**:
⭐ Soft silicone Comfort ProperFit™ cushion.
⭐ Ergonomically designed pump body.
⭐ Adjustable suction handle.
